channel.title: Help with password unencryption
channel.description:
Hey guys! First of all, I have a server that has been, overall, pretty successful. In not much time, I reached 4,800 accounts. I'm switching to a source that has encrypted passwords, and I would like to know the easiest way to do this (it wouldn't be very fun to log in individually to every account on the new server and transfer stats and items).
One more thing: I didn't want to double post with this or go off topic in my thread, but if anybody knows a free website that I can make to put my .jar webclient on it, it would be great.
Thanks for the help and your time, PROUD owner of Legendz PK, Legendz (aka mod whip)

item.title: Help with password unencryption
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

[quote=“Unreal1032, post:4, topic:229479”][quote author=stormcutter link=topic=301881.msg2422356#msg2422356 date=1220401531]
In client.java search for “password encryption” then for md5 and remove whats in both of those sections.
[/quote]
You beat me to it…[/quote]
lol…
thanks for the help guys[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 03, 2008, 07:07:58 pm[/size][hr]ganna try this soon.

Read full topic
